channel.title: Homes on Manoj Shankar AJ
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Manoj Shankar AJ

item.title: Manoj Shankar AJ
item.description: Master’s in Computer Science student at ASU coupled with 2 years software dev experience deeply interested in developing scalable cloud applications/services. Actively seeking 2018 Summer Internship opportunities. (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I am a Master’s student at Arizona State University, USA pursuing Master’s in Computer Science. My areas of interests are building scalable cloud applications/services, Data science and Machine Learning. My career began as a Summer Intern at Samsung R&D Centre, India during my undergraduate. I worked full-time as a Software Development Engineer then at Zoho Corporation developing new features for the cloud application Zoho CRM. I love algorithms, programming and applying computer science concepts to solve real world problems that humanity faces.

item.title: Experience
item.description: • ZOHO CORPORATION, Chennai, India June 2015 - June 2017 * Role: Member Technical Staff * Worked solo to develop a ‘Mass Operations’ framework for the cloud application Zoho CRM which lets users to perform bulk operations like updating, deleting, changing ownership of up to 100,000 records in a module. * Worked in Translation Platform for Zoho CRM which enables users add new languages and translations to the Zoho CRM application • SAMSUNG RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE, Bangalore, India May 2014 - July 2014

item.title: Skill-set
item.description: Programming Languages: Java, C++, Python, Javascript Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis IDE/Tools: NetBeans, Eclipse, GitHub, Mercurial, Jenkins, Perforce Web: HTML, CSS, Handlebars, JSP, jQuery, Ajax Operating Systems: Linux, Mac OS X, Windows(10,7)
